meanings.definition: A round or oval ornament resembling a rose
meanings.sent1: The golden rosette on her dress sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She received a beautiful rosette as a prize for winning the competition.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to play with the shiny rosette hanging from the curtain.
meanings.sent4: The rosette of stars in the night sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The intricate rosette carved on the wooden door caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A cluster of leaves or petals radiating from a central point
meanings.sent1: The rosette of green leaves at the base of the plant was lush and vibrant.
meanings.sent2: The succulent had a beautiful rosette of pink petals at its center.
meanings.sent3: The rosette of flowers in the garden looked like a colorful explosion.
meanings.sent4: The rosette of dancers moved gracefully across the stage.
meanings.sent5: The rosette of feathers on the bird's chest was striking against its dark plumage.

meanings.definition: A circular decoration or design with a flower-like pattern
meanings.sent1: The intricate rosette on the ceiling added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The stained glass window featured a beautiful rosette design.
meanings.sent3: The baker decorated the cake with a delicate rosette made of frosting.
meanings.sent4: The rosette on the shield symbolized honor and bravery.
meanings.sent5: The intricate rosette pattern on the fabric was eye-catching.
